alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marion; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 7:12PM CDT until September 17 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in central Iowa... Northwestern Marion County in south central Iowa... Southwestern Jasper County in central Iowa... Northern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carlisle, or 7 miles southeast of Des Moines, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carlisle around 715 PM CDT. Pleasant Hill, Iowa State Fairgrounds and Hartford around 720 PM CDT. Runnells and Swan around 730 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 near mile marker 144, and between mile markers 146 and 147. Interstate 235 between mile markers 10 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
